headline: FICO Tweak May Change Credit Scores
abstract: FICO is tweaking its all-important formula. Scores will rise for about 40 million people and drop for another 40 million.
lead_paragraph: Your credit score — that all-important passport within the financial world — may be about to change. And it won’t necessarily be because of anything you did or didn’t do.
keywords: Federal Home Loan Mortgage Corp (Freddie Mac)
